value.name: Parents Of Misty Holt-Singh React To Family's Settlement With City Of Stockton
value.description: The parents of Misty Holt-Singh, the woman killed by Stockton police during a 2014 shootout are speaking out just hours after the city announced it has reached a settlement with the family.

value.name: Calling in the troops... Methane reduction proposal... New questions about new air bags
value.description: The lawsuit says Stockton police officers used unreasonable force when they fired more than 600 times at the vehicle containing the suspects and hostage Misty Holt-Singh, who was struck by 10 bullets.
